plays.text: Penalty to Paul Healey 2 minutes for Tripping Scott Niedermayer
Penalty to Ken Daneyko 2 minutes for Crosschecking Tie Domi
Goal scored by Travis Green assisted by Bryan McCabe and Shayne Corson
Penalty to Tie Domi 2 minutes for Boarding Oleg Tverdovsky
Penalty to Bryan McCabe 2 minutes for Obstruction - Tripping Patrik Elias
Penalty to Scott Niedermayer 2 minutes for Tripping Mikael Renberg
Penalty to Darcy Tucker 2 minutes for Holding Sergei Brylin
